entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 this morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
